Getting to RIPM

  • Direct link to RIPM

To get to RIPM is pretty straight forward.

First you need to go to the UMD's Library Home Page (which is lib.umd.edu) and then click on the link to "Research Port"

If you are off campus, you will have to log in using your university ID.

Then you can either search for RIPM by database or you can browse through the categories by first going to music, and then looking through the databases alphabetically.

  • RIPM Database through Research Port
  • Ebsco Help
    This has extensive information on searching and other features of the database.
